pages.text: $(thing)Lava Cats$() are a $(thing)Friendly$() type of Fire Elemental, native to the $(thing)Nether$(). Their body consists entirely of $(item)Lava$(), allowing them to take less damage from magical sources. They will turn into $(thing)Obsidian Cats$() if they come into contact with $(item)Water$(). $(thing)Obsidian Cats$() move slower, deal more damage, and receive reduced physical damage. Both forms can be $(thing)Tamed$() using $(item)Blaze Rods$() and bred using $(item)Blaze Powder$().

pages.name: Lava Cat
pages.drop1: minecraft:obsidian{display: {Lore: ["Dropchance: 70%", "Only if Lava Cat has been turned to Obsidian"]}}
pages.drop2: minecraft:cobblestone{display: {Lore: ["Dropchance: 50%", "Only if Lava Cat has been turned to Obsidian"]}}
